dcterms:description: The dataset provides turnstile usage counts of NYC subway stations every 4 hours, with data collected from 136 subway stations in Manhattan, totaling about 2.4 million entry/exit counts daily on average.
dcterms:title: NYC Subway

dcterms:creator: Jintao Ke
Siyuan Feng
Zheng Zhu
Hai Yang
Jieping Ye
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of for-hire vehicle data from NYC Taxi & Limousine Commission, including 43 million trip records during the study period, with information on pick-up and drop-off times and zones.
dcterms:title: NYC Ride-hailing
